additionalProperties.description: The service id use it to define the access to the service, like 'cats', then you will access like 'services.cats'

version.description: The id of the info.version related with this data source/operation, if not provided by default will be linked to the first api-definition info.version

private.description: If set to true the operation will not be exposed even if there is set on the api swagger

method.description: The HTTP method that will be use to request the data using 'https://github.com/sindresorhus/got'

url.description: The URL that will be use to request the data using 'https://github.com/sindresorhus/got'

inherit.description: Determine if this operation behaviour will inherit from the previus version operation with the same id

applyLoopbackFilter.description: Whether or not allow the application of loopback filters to the operation result data

options.description: Add the got module properties here, see 'https://github.com/sindresorhus/got'
